1275020.name: Cosmic Flow - Supporter Badge DLC
1275020.description:
I believe that art should be free but living costs money.

This DLC is for people that would like to support the development of Cosmic Flow and experiences like it but don't want to use PayPal or Patreon.
There is no content in this DLC other than a "Thank you for your support!" badge in the main menu. The free experience will continue to be updated.
Your support is greatly appreciated and will bring me closer to being able to do this full-time.
